title: Parents keep fighting, don't speak for many days! He wants her to work during menses assim al hakeem
transcript: sh my parents they always keep fighting they have argument every month so my dad does not understand about period so he keeps ordering my mom to do things and when she says no he still keeps telling her that don't give excuses and do it even if they have an argument they don't talk for 5 to S days so what should my dad do sh this is something this is something that both of them need counseling definitely they have a problem in the field of communication and the field of respect and also in the field of knowing each one's rights and obligations so they need to have counseling with a Muslim counselor who would listen to both of them and correct them and show them what to do
